plot: Seven-year old, Amber, is convinced that she can bring her hamster back to life by watering his grave... now if it will only work for her father... and the body she saw her teacher burying in the woods...
title: Watering Mr. Cocoa
plot_es: Seven-year old, Amber, is convinced that she can bring her hamster back to life by watering his grave... now if it will only work for her father... and the body she saw her teacher burying in the woods...
plot_en: Seven-year old, Amber, is convinced that she can bring her hamster back to life by watering his grave... now if it will only work for her father... and the body she saw her teacher burying in the woods...
